body.name: 2.5K Wireless Solar Security Camera System, 10CH 8PCS Solar Cameras, 4MP PTZ Camera Outdoor WiFi, Home Surveillance Cameras Worked with Alexa, PIR Detection, Two Way Talk, 128GB Storage
deliveryMessages: Delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 43 mins
features: 【Solar Powered & Built-in Battery 9000】Our wireless security camera with solar panel, which can improve the photoelectric conversion efficiency by 20%, only need 2 hours of sunlight a day to maintain 365 days of uninterrupted protection of your family, no need to remove it to charge. Even without the sun, the 9000mAh battery capacity can keep it running for 4-6 months. The solar panel could eliminating the hassle of removing the camera for manual recharging. 100% Wireless!

【4MP HD & Color Night Vision】Experience a 50% improvement over 1080P with 2K 4MP (2560x1440P) quality, enabling you to watch and record videos with greater clarity, up to a range of 100FT. Equipped with infrared light and 4 spotlight, wifi camera outside supports black and white IR night vision view and full color night vision view, providing you with HD color images no matter day or night.

【PIR Human Detection and Instant Alert】The solar-powered surveillance camera is equipped with a smart PIR, this solar camera security outdoor quickly senses and pushes notifications to you when there is human, pet and car movement, while avoiding false alarms when flowers, plants and flying insects move , focus only on what's important. Sensitivity from "Low-Medium-High" can be set in the "Eseecloud" APP. You can easily stay informed about any events on the app.

【Pan/Tilt & 2-way Audio】Pan/Tilt solar cameras for home security can be rotated 355° horizontally and 90° vertically. With reliable and stable 2.4Ghz WiFi connection (NOT Support 5G), you can effortlessly enjoy uninterrupted video streaming and remote access to your camera from anywhere at any time. The built-in microphone and speaker provide a smooth and stable conversation environment. You can receive real-time alerts and communicate from anywhere using the two-way audio function via APP.

【2 Ways Storage & Mulit-User Sharing】 You can use SD card/Cloud storage to save video footage, SD card supports 4-128GB (Not included card), open the cloud storage function on the APP (Eseecloud ) and get 15 days free cloud storage service. You can share the camera with your family (Max 4 people online at the same time) and protect your home together. The solar security camera outdoor is ideal for outdoor work such as parking lots, garages, backyards and front yards.
body.description: 1*10CH 5MP NVR (built-in 128G) 8*4MP solar cameras 1*12V 2A NVR power supply (1.2m) 8*6V 4W solar panel 1* mouse 1*HDMI cable 1*Solar camera instruction manual
